name: about
title: What is JS Middle Developer Growth ?
content: It's educational initiative which hepls candidate to become D2 quickly and with better quality

name: benefits
title: What benefits you can receive ?
benefits: Helping hand for prepare mentee to ASMT
L2 ASMT request can be submitted in 4 hours after passing all talks (no failed required)
JSMU result can be used on ASMT as artifact
Help RM to save time on MENTEE preparation (But final decision about ASMT request submit make by RM)
Share knowledge between mentee and expert/networking
